snippet: Technology Integration with Respect NEP2020 The integration of technology in education is a critical component of the New Education Policy (NEP) in India, which was approved in 2020. " Technology integration represents the idea that all uses of technology in K-12 schools are determined by first starting with the various curricula (e.g., mathematics, science, reading, writing, social studies) and then identifying technologies and ways that technologies can be used to improve learning in the curricula areas."
